Package com.commander4j.db

Class JDBQuery

java.lang.Object
com.commander4j.db.JDBQuery
public class JDBQuery extends Object
The JDBQuery is a utility class for building SQL queries generated by the user searching for data on one of the data admin screens. It should be noted that this class has been superseded by JDBQuery2
See Also:
